data.message:
Reading the story of Dave Pelzer...
part 1..A child called "It"
Part 2..The lost boy
Part 3..A man named Dave
A story of Triumph and forgiveness
A really great story to read but also very heart breaking....

replies.message: my young son, never much of a reader, sat and read 'A Child Called It' from cover to cover, and wrote a wonderful book report on it. He finished the series and loved them all.
Bought those books for my mom back in the early 2000's. She's not a reader but LOVED them.

I am about to donate them(3)to our library. They seem not to be able to keep them. The series is a must to get at one time so ya can just continue to read. Your young son.. Martha Lynch.... Must have a sense for reading because it is indept. ...
